SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: USE DW_SALUD SET DATEFORMAT ymd DELETE FROM H_TRANSACCIONES_CABECERA where id_periodo>=year(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) * 100 + month(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate()))

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

properties.property: SELECT t.AWE_TRA AS ID, year(AWE_FEC) * 100 + month(AWE_FEC)as id_Periodo, t.AWE_PER as id_persona, CASE WHEN AWE_NRO>2147483647 THEN 0 ELSE AWE_NRO END as Nro_Afiliado_Origen, AWE_SOR as Secuencia_Origen, CAST(DatePart(YEAR, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(4))+'-'+ Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') +'-'+Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') as Fecha_Proceso_Transaccion, 57 as id_tipo_orden_transaccion, t.AWE_AUT as Numero_Orden_Transaccion, 0 as id_especialidad, (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end) as Id_Acreedor, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, t.AWE_PRE as Id_Profesional, IsNull(t.AWE_PRE_PRES,0) as Id_Profesional_Prescribiente, 'P' as id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente, case when awr_err in (0,20) then 0 else 1 end as Id_Resultado_Cabecera_Transaccion, case when t.AWE_FEC<'2016-04-01' and awr_err>0 then 22 else awr_err end as id_motivo_rechazo_transaccion, 0 as id_origen_transaccion, 4 as id_tipo_transaccion, 1 as Cantidad_Transacciones, case when t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) then t.AWE_EMP else 0 end as id_canal_transaccion, --SanCor Salud case when t.AWE_EMP = 5 and t.AWE_ORI=7 then 7 else isnull(t.AWE_ORI, 0) end as id_interfaz_transaccion, t.AWE_FEC as fecha_prestacion, 4 as id_tipo_transaccion_metodo from TAWE_TRA t (nolock) left join AW_transacciones_anuladas anu (nolock) on anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden=t.AWE_AUT AND anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden>0 join convenios_canales cc on (cc.canales_id=1 or cc.canales_id=2 and t.AWE_FEC>=cc.fecha_produccion) and (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end)=cc.numero_convenio AND (t.AWE_FEC<=cc.fecha_baja or cc.fecha_baja is null) AND cc.canales_id=case when awe_emp=4 then 2 else 1 end where anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden is null and t.AWE_FEC >=cast(cast(year(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as CHAR(4)) + '-' + cast(month(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as VARCHAR(2) ) + '-01' as datetime) and t.AWE_PRG in ('PAWE_SAU', 'AUTO','AUTF4') and t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) and t.AWE_NRO<>121297 and isnull(t.AWE_PRU,0)=0 and not (t.AWE_PRG = 'AUTO' and t.AWR_ERR = 0 and t.AWE_AUT = 0)

properties.property: SELECT t.AWE_TRA AS ID, year(AWE_FEC) * 100 + month(AWE_FEC)as id_Periodo, t.AWE_PER as id_persona, CASE WHEN AWE_NRO>2147483647 THEN 0 ELSE AWE_NRO END as Nro_Afiliado_Origen, AWE_SOR as Secuencia_Origen, CAST(DatePart(YEAR, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(4))+'-'+ Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') +'-'+Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') as Fecha_Proceso_Transaccion, 57 as id_tipo_orden_transaccion, t.AWE_AUT as Numero_Orden_Transaccion, 0 as id_especialidad, (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end) as Id_Acreedor, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, t.AWE_PRE as Id_Profesional, IsNull(t.AWE_PRE_PRES,0) as Id_Profesional_Prescribiente, 'P' as id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente, case when awr_err in (0,20) then 0 else 1 end as Id_Resultado_Cabecera_Transaccion, case when t.AWE_FEC<'2016-04-01' and awr_err>0 then 22 else awr_err end as id_motivo_rechazo_transaccion, 0 as id_origen_transaccion, 1 as id_tipo_transaccion, 1 as Cantidad_Transacciones, case when t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) then t.AWE_EMP else 0 end as id_canal_transaccion, --SanCor Salud case when t.AWE_EMP = 5 and t.AWE_ORI=7 then 7 else isnull(t.AWE_ORI, 0) end as id_interfaz_transaccion, t.AWE_FEC as fecha_prestacion, 1 as id_tipo_transaccion_metodo from TAWE_TRA t (nolock) left join AW_transacciones_anuladas anu (nolock) on anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden=t.AWE_AUT AND anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden>0 join convenios_canales cc on (cc.canales_id=1 or cc.canales_id=2) and (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end)=cc.numero_convenio AND (t.AWE_FEC<=cc.fecha_baja or cc.fecha_baja is null) AND cc.canales_id=case when awe_emp=4 then 2 else 1 end where anu.AW_TransAnuladas_NroOrden is null and t.AWE_FEC >=cast(cast(year(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as CHAR(4)) + '-' + cast(month(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as VARCHAR(2) ) + '-01' as datetime) and t.AWE_PRG in ('PAWE_ELI', 'ELIG') and t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) and t.AWE_NRO<>121297 and isnull(t.AWE_PRU,0)=0 and (t.AWE_MCT <> 'N' or (t.AWE_MCT = 'N' and t.AWE_PRG in ('PAWE_ELI', 'ELIG') and t.AWR_ERR <> 0))

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

property.name: CommandTimeout

properties.property: SELECT t.AWE_TRA AS ID, year(AWE_FEC) * 100 + month(AWE_FEC)as id_Periodo, t.AWE_PER as id_persona, CASE WHEN AWE_NRO>2147483647 THEN 0 ELSE AWE_NRO END as Nro_Afiliado_Origen, AWE_SOR as Secuencia_Origen, CAST(DatePart(YEAR, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(4))+'-'+ Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') +'-'+Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') as Fecha_Proceso_Transaccion, 57 as id_tipo_orden_transaccion, t.AWE_AUT as Numero_Orden_Transaccion, 0 as id_especialidad, (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end) as Id_Acreedor, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, t.AWE_PRE as Id_Profesional, IsNull(t.AWE_PRE_PRES,0) as Id_Profesional_Prescribiente, 'P' as id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente, case when awr_err in (0,20) then 0 else 1 end as Id_Resultado_Cabecera_Transaccion, case when t.AWE_FEC<'2016-04-01' and awr_err>0 then 22 else awr_err end as id_motivo_rechazo_transaccion, 0 as id_origen_transaccion, 3 as id_tipo_transaccion, 1 as Cantidad_Transacciones, case when t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) then t.AWE_EMP else 0 end as id_canal_transaccion, --SanCor Salud case when t.AWE_EMP = 5 and t.AWE_ORI=7 then 7 else isnull(t.AWE_ORI, 0) end as id_interfaz_transaccion, t.AWE_FEC as fecha_prestacion, 3 as id_tipo_transaccion_metodo from TAWE_TRA t (nolock) join dbo.convenios_canales cc on (cc.canales_id=1 or cc.canales_id=2 and t.AWE_FEC>=cc.fecha_produccion) and (case when t.AWE_CON>0 then t.AWE_CON else t.AWE_ENT end)=cc.numero_convenio AND (t.AWE_FEC<=cc.fecha_baja or cc.fecha_baja is null) AND cc.canales_id=case when awe_emp=4 then 2 else 1 end where t.AWE_FEC >=cast(cast(year(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as CHAR(4)) + '-' + cast(month(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as VARCHAR(2) ) + '-01' as datetime) and t.AWE_PRG = 'SIMU' and t.AWE_EMP IN (4, 5) and t.AWE_NRO<>121297 and isnull(t.AWE_PRU,0)=0

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property: SELECT t.AWE_TRA AS ID, year(AWE_FEC) * 100 + month(AWE_FEC)as id_Periodo, t.AWE_PER as id_persona, CASE WHEN AWE_NRO>2147483647 THEN 0 ELSE AWE_NRO END as Nro_Afiliado_Origen, AWE_SOR as Secuencia_Origen, CAST(DatePart(YEAR, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(4))+'-'+ Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(month, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') +'-'+Replace((case when CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) < 10 then '0'+CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) else CAST(DatePart(day, t.AWE_FEC) as CHAR(2)) end),' ','') as Fecha_Proceso_Transaccion, 0 as id_tipo_orden_transaccion, 0 as Numero_Orden_Transaccion, 0 as id_especialidad, 0 as Id_Acreedor, '' as id_tipo_prestador, 0 as Id_Profesional, 0 as Id_Profesional_Prescribiente, '' as id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente, case when awr_err in (0,20) then 0 else 1 end as Id_Resultado_Cabecera_Transaccion, case when t.AWE_FEC<'2016-04-01' and awr_err>0 then 22 else awr_err end as id_motivo_rechazo_transaccion, 0 as id_origen_transaccion, 2 as id_tipo_transaccion, 1 as Cantidad_Transacciones, 5 as id_canal_transaccion, --SanCor Salud 7 as id_interfaz_transaccion, t.AWE_FEC as fecha_prestacion, 2 as id_tipo_transaccion_metodo from TAWE_TRA t (nolock) WHERE t.AWE_ENT = 99999999 and t.AWE_FEC >=cast(cast(year(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as CHAR(4)) + '-' + cast(month(DATEADD(month, -2, getdate())) as VARCHAR(2) ) + '-01' as datetime)

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable
